meanings.definition: A sexual activity involving three people.
meanings.sent1: They decided to try threesomes to spice up their relationship.
meanings.sent2: Threesomes are not for everyone and require open communication.
meanings.sent3: At the party, they joked about having threesomes but knew it was just talk.
meanings.sent4: In some cultures, threesomes are seen as taboo while in others they are accepted.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed threesomes as exciting and adventurous.

meanings.definition: A group of three people or things.
meanings.sent1: The threesomes of friends went on a hike together.
meanings.sent2: There were three threesomes competing in the final round.
meanings.sent3: The threesomes in the relay race passed the baton smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The threesomes of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The threesomes of trees stood tall in the forest.
